Params: {2: 'Vera', 3: "Seems like I'm the first here again.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Vera twirls a lock of her flowing red hair, scheming in delight.'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "A Strike Hawk member corrupted... I've been longing for such a fat piece of merit.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "I'm not going to stand in your way.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'I just need to ask Kamui some questions.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "Whatever you do with him afterward, I won't have any objections.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'But allow me to remind you that, if you all dilly dally for too long and the other cleaners arrive... You know what I will do.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'No... I just... decided to... remove the virus inside me...'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "We both know that there's no such method. Otherwise, we wouldn't have that many sacrifices..."}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "I can't explain to you... because I'm not sure myself... It's nothing more than a gamble..."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: 'In view of our friendship, I can give you the opportunity to execute him.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "After all, it's the same for me dead or alive.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: 'Hmph, weakling... Guess I gotta do everything myself.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: "Do you want to stop my mission? Just to let you know, if you do, that'll be an act of treason.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "No... I won't stop you. Rather, I demand you.", 4: '3'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "Well, if you're really true to your word, I'd like to redeem it here.", 4: '3'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "I thought you'd use it somewhere more interesting, like...", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: "Hmph—! When I got up this morning, I wasn't expecting you to ruin my mood, Lee.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Vera turns around and stretches, as if relieved, and leaves without looking back.'}
{3: 'But the powerful sound of high heels on the steel plate still vaguely reveals her extremely displeased mood.'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "By the way, it's just that I won't intervene in this matter.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'What happens next, well, good luck to you all. Au revoir.', 4: '1'}
